header.rec_loc: ANON and ANON's home, Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food for a snack, the school day, what we are going to do, eating, being quiet/loud, being on stage, shared memories, computers, drawing on the computer

speaker.hab_dur: 11 months (First year and half second year)

speaker.fls: Imogen has just started French and Spanish at school. At this point she only knows a few dozen words of these languages -- level unspecified
